attributes.background: To help other individuals with family members with debilitating neurological disabilities

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what kind of help you would like the Government to provide. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you'd like some help writing a new petition, please contact us at petitionsteam@parliament.uk
